Title: Treatment for ascites in people with decompensated liver cirrhosis: A network meta-analysis
Abstract: © 2018 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is a protocol for a Cochrane Review (Intervention). The objectives are as follows: To compare the benefits and harms of different treatments for ascites in people with decompensated liver cirrhosis.
